nodes.bodyText: I don't think isInDynamic works well, either isInDynamicDeck or inDynamicDeck as suggested by Mike would be more readable.

there is something to be said for java method naming conventions, and I like the 'isNNN' naming Arthur went for. 'isInDynamicDeck' is the most semantically precise. Now that I'm pulling these things locally and running them anyway (since travis isn't working for us) I just did this and repushed so there won't be any more back and forth -> merging
